subtitle: Tonight marked a historic day in our mission in India. title: Chowkidar Pankaj Mishra
subtitle:
The situation in northeast #Syria is dire.
People say what they need most is food, medicine, clothes and other daily essentials.

So far, WFP has provided food to more than 280,000 displaced people and host families

We are also providing food to refugees who fled to #Iraq pic.twitter.com/eFqGM4Zc2c

title: Chowkidar Pankaj Mishra
subtitle:
Floods came.They changed the land.

Cyclones came.They adapted.

Landslides came.They showed their resilience.

Water was scarce.They deployed solar-powered pumps.

Rohingya refugees have become #ClimateAction pros.

Awareness of Climate Action + Flood's +Disaster'spic.twitter.com/1CJPWBnEmb

title: UNAMI
subtitle:
Special Representative of the United Nations Secretary-General for #Iraq, Ms. Jeanine Hennis-Plasschaert, visited Bardarash camp on 23 October. The camp in Dohuk Governorate recently reopened to host incoming refugees from #Syria.

Press Release https://bit.ly/2BJsiYI pic.twitter.com/YolMQF7svC
